parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e ; valid only for regular explode steps

title: IExplodeStep.SetExplodeDirection
description: Sets the explode direction (manipulator index and entity) for this explode step.
signature:
void SetExplodeDirection( 
   System.Object
ExplodeDirection
,
   System.Int32
ExplDirIndex
)

parameters.name: ExplDirIndex
parameters.description: Explode direction manipulator index as defined in swExplodeDirectionIndex_e ; valid only for regular explode steps
